section_title: Variables and Data Types in Python
section_description: This section introduces the fundamental concepts of variables and data types in Python programming. Students will learn how to create variables, understand different data types, and perform basic operations on them. These concepts form the building blocks for all future programming tasks in Python.
learning_objectives: Define and declare variables in Python using proper naming conventions
Identify and use Python's built-in data types: integers, floats, strings, and booleans
Perform type conversion between different data types
Apply basic operations on variables and data types
Debug and resolve common variable-related errors

lessons.lesson_objective: Understand what variables are and how to create them in Python

exercises.exercise_instructions: Create variables to store your name, age, and favorite color. Print each variable with a descriptive label.

lessons.lesson_objective: Identify and use Python's fundamental data types

exercises.exercise_instructions: Create one variable of each basic data type (integer, float, string, boolean). Use the type() function to verify their types and print the results.

lessons.lesson_objective: Manipulate and perform operations on string variables

exercises.exercise_instructions: Create a string variable containing your full name. Write code to print your name in uppercase, lowercase, and the length of your name.

lessons.lesson_objective: Convert between different data types in Python

exercises.exercise_instructions: Create a string variable containing a number. Convert it to an integer and a float. Then convert both back to strings and print all variables with their types.

lessons.lesson_title: Practical Application of Variables and Data Types
lessons.lesson_objective: Apply knowledge of variables and data types to solve simple problems

exercises.exercise_instructions: Write a simple program that asks the user for two numbers, performs addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, and displays the results with appropriate labels.
